alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued August 20 at 1:46AM MDT until August 21 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains and Tooele and Rush Valleys. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 9 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult due to crosswinds, especially for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to be strongest in wind prone locations of the Tooele and Rush Valleys, especially those locations that experience strong winds in south wind situations. Winds will create rough, choppy conditions on the Great Salt Lake as well.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
